text: wallh subhanah hu alghalb alqahir fawq ebadh; khadaeat lah alriqab wdhallat lah aljbabrt, wahu alhakim aldhy yadae al'ashya' mwadeha wafq hkmt, alkhabir aldhy la yakhfaa ealayh shy'. wamin atsf bhdhh alsfat yjb 'alla yushrik bh. wafi hadhih alayat 'iithbat alfwqyt lilah -teala- ealaa jmye khlqh, fwqyt mutlaqat taliq bjlalh sbhanh
